Package suncertify.db

This package contains classes related to the database back end.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ConcurrentStack<E> A stack that can handle multiple threads simultaneously.
DBMain Main table access interface that is required to be implemented by the Data class.
FieldParsers A group of field parsers.
LockManager This class keeps track of which objects are locked.
Table A database table.
TableRequestManager Interface for something that manages concurrent requests to a Table.
TableSchema Interface for getting information about the schema of a Table.
 

Class Summary
CombinedTable A database table that combines the functionality of a Table and a LockManager in order to manage its own locks.
Data Client table access implementation that implements the required DBMain interface.
LockableRecord A record and its lock.
OptimisticConcurrentStack<E> A concurrent stack using Treiber's algorithm.
Record This class models the values of a database record at a particular time (indicated by its timestamp).
SerialNumber An immutable serial number.
SimpleRequestManager Manages concurrent database requests to a table.
URLyBirdFieldParsers A collection of parsers for fields in the URLyBird database file format.
URLyBirdSchema Table-specific information about the format of the fields.
 

Exception Summary
DuplicateKeyException Checked exception to indicate that a Record could not be created or modified because it would be identical to another record in an important way.
FileWriteException Runtime exception indicating that there was a problem when trying to write data to a file.
LockException Runtime exception to indicate a lock security exception, for example when a client tries to modify a record that they haven't locked.
RecordNotFoundException Exception indicating that the requested record could not be found.
StaleTimestampException Unchecked exception to indicate that a client's copy of a record's timestamp is not up to date, probably because another client has modified the record without the other client's knowledge.
 

Package suncertify.db Description

This package contains classes related to the database back end. All of the classes in this package are thread-safe.
